title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 05 December 2014 - XWiki
content:
<momomomomo> has quit

09:48 <Lyes> has quit  
09:55 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
09:55 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
10:03 <KermitTheFragger> has joined #xwiki  
10:55 <AFKGeek> has joined #xwiki  
11:18 <Enygma`> vmassol: This series of test failures seem to be related to register.vm and seem to be causing nasty OOM errors. http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-enterprise-test-ui-6.3.x/32/  
11:19 <Enygma`> I know you did some work recently on the registration part, is this related?  
11:30 <vmassol> Enygma`: checking the tests to try to see wht's wrong  
11:30 <vmassol> when I look at the stack trace  
11:30 <vmassol> I see a template problem  
11:30 <vmassol> so my guess is that this is possibly caused by thomas's template refactoring  
11:31 <vmassol> (all I did was work on the mail sending anyway)  
11:31 <vmassol> see https://gist.githubusercontent.com/vmassol/afa916b647ff9798126e/raw/e7e9d12dea63462ea2bb12d063521cd0801c19c4/gistfile1.txt  
11:32 <vmassol> so either template or skin extension  
11:32 <vmassol> but  
11:32 <vmassol> it could be that memory is low from other stuff and the error just happens here because it requires some memory at that time  
11:35 <Enygma`> wonder why that does not happen on master as well  
11:36 <Enygma`> I guess we`ll wait on Monday for Thomas to have a look  
11:40 <vmassol> is it always failing?  
11:40 <vmassol> (across different job executions)  
11:41 <vmassol> if it is then it's likely the issue is in the registration module (and possibly a combination with template/sx)  
11:41 <vmassol> if not, then it's just bad luck the OOM happens there  
11:41 <vmassol> hmm the problem is that our tests always execute in the same order  
11:41 <vmassol> so it's possible it'll always fail there ;)  
11:45 <Lyes1> has quit  
12:54 <lucaa> has quit  
13:26 <Enygma`> might be fun if we could randomize the test execution order on each run :)  
13:30 <vmassol> Enygma`: actually thomas released 6.4M1 a few daysa go  
13:31 <vmassol> and all jobs were passing  
13:31 <vmassol> so it means the problem was introduced in the mast 1 or 2 days  
13:31 <vmassol> \*last

19:54 <MrHeavy> Is anything up with the extensions repository? I'm trying to do a new install and I get "Failed to retrieve extension data.Server not responding" when trying to install the UI bundle through Distribution Manager  
19:55 <DuFFo> has joined #xwiki  
20:00 <MrHeavy> Oh, never mind, it's trying to load HTTP content even though I have an HTTPS endpoint  
20:00 <MrHeavy> Must have missed some config somewhere  
20:21 <MrHeavy> I set xwiki.home and xwiki.url.protocol correctly in the config, but it's still trying to load XHR resources over HTTP instead of HTTPS. What else do I need to set?
